translations.global_message_1_1: A task is running. Do you terminate current task and redirect to next page?
translations.login_component_ts_3_1: Welcome to the login page. Please enter your account dispatched randomly by this platform.
translations.login_component_ts_3_2: If you forget username and password, please click button "Forget". This platform will dispatch new username and password randomly to you again.
translations.login_component_ts_3_3: After login, this platform will create a token to you, which will be expired after seven days. After that token expired, you will not be permited to do anything, but it will redirect to the login page instead. You have to login again for a new token to keep on enjoy.
translations.login_component_ts_8_2: If your are an administrator, you should know what your username and password are.
